project.name: C-C191A-SUBV-10-ST03-DT06-DF16-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C191A-SUBV-10-ST03-DT06-DF16-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Reads in a size to use for a malloc. The size subtracts 10 before being used, which results in an integer underflow and an attempt at allocating a very large chunk of memory

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="45" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C191A-SUBV-10-ST03-DT06-DF16-CF18-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Reads in a size to use for a malloc. The size subtracts 10 before being used, which results in an integer underflow and an attempt at allocating a very large chunk of memory

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="80" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
